prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon that can roll into a ball and bounces around playfully.
Imagine a Pokemon with soft wool and majestic horns, perfect for a pastoral scene.
Design an adorable sheep-like creature with a strong presence and a charming personality.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, known for its gentle nature and fluffy appearance.
Make a cuddly yet powerful Pokemon that can defend its flock with impressive strength.
Show me a Pokemon with a playful demeanor and a love for open fields and sunny days.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of rural life with its woolly coat and friendly nature.
